name: Hex Twitter Profile Template
description:
Now you can mint your own NFTs! Ha ha ha... ha.


Instructions

1/ Modify the profile pic component to whatever you want

2/ Click the Export artboard and export it.

3/ Set the exported png file as your profile picture on Twitter*


*You must use an app like Tweetbot for iOS, which allows you to upload a profile picture directly to Twitter. Edit: On twitter.com, you can upload a transparent photo by clicking the ‚Üê Back button after selecting a photo instead of the Apply button.
